extendedInfo.description: In this highly addictive puzzle game you have to fill the board with a single color in less than allowed steps.== Rules ==You start level from the top left corner. Select a new color using buttons. All the cells adjacent to the selected color will be added to your flood area. Level is finished when whole board is with a single color. If you fill the board in less than allowed steps you will be moved to the next level. Otherwise you will be prompt to try again and board will be restarted.== Game modes ==Flood Extreme contains two game modes:- Adventure (default) - in this mode you travel through many different levels with different colors- Tactic - depends on the difficulty you have to pass levels with static number of colors.For every game mode you can choose different difficulty level: lame, easy, medium and extreme! For example in Tactic in medium you have 5 colors for every level, but in extreme mode you have 7 colors!At the top of the playing screen you can also see your statistics: number of plays, wins, loss, minimum number of steps in which you completed level. Those statistics are provided separately for every level! == Features ==- different skins, see settings in main menu- many board sizes- lot of levels, lot of fun!- two game modes: Adventure and Tactic- 5 difficulty modes: lame, easy, medium, hard, extreme- sound effects- background music for menu and gameplay- fast jumping to completed levels- moving to previous or next level- number of the last played level is stored on the phone- player statistics- support for tablets- and much more...This is the first official release.If you like Flood It, Flood or any other flood style game you should definitely love Flood Extreme!I hope you enjoy this game. If you have any suggestions write to kasurdev (at) gmail.com.If you like this game rate it 5! Thanks :)

reviews.comment: this is my favorite version of flood!!!!
